title: Teacher Facilitation Competency Development Program for Inquiry-Based Learning (IBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education experience and understanding of Inquiry-Based Learning (IBL) concepts
context.additional_context: Language education environment utilizing digital devices (tablets/laptops), emphasizing real-time interaction between learners and instructors.

learning_goals: Planning to use analytical tools that predict learner inquiry pathways when designing IBL (Inquiry-Based Learning) curricula
Implementing at least three flexible instructional adjustment strategies through real-time learning data monitoring
Achieving over 80% on assessments evaluating the ability to map learning objectives to analytical indicators in IBL activity design
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
